control.description: Do Not Auto Scroll Description (Albums / Artists / Songs)
control.label: $LOCALIZE[31402]
control.visible: [[Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,77) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,62) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,67) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,72)] + [Container.Content(Albums) | Container.Content(Songs) | Container.Content(Artists)]] | [[Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,96) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,599) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,64)] + Container.Content(Albums)]

control.description: Do Not Auto Scroll Plot (Movies / Sets / TV Shows / Episodes / Programs)

control.visible: [Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,587) + Container.Content(musicvideos)] | [Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,75) + Container.Content(Movies)] | [[Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,58) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,66) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,95) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,97) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,53) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,588)] + [Container.Content(Movies) | Container.Content(Sets)]] | [[Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,76) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,61) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,65) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,589) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,100) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,588)] + Container.Content(TVShows)] | [[Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,74) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,73) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,68) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,94)] + Container.Content(Episodes)] | [[Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,590) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,591) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,592) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,593) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,594) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,595) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,596) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,597) | Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,598)] + Substring(Container.FolderPath,plugin://plugin.program)] | [Skin.String(CurrentViewMode,585) + [Substring(Container.FolderPath,videodb://movies/) | Substring(Container.FolderPath,videodb://tvshows/) | Substring(Container.FolderPath,videodb://musicvideos/) | Substring(Container.FolderPath,musicdb://)]]
